message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14,000.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you being flexible. I'm really interested in this product, but $14,000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'd be willing to pay $13,000 for it. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make a counteroffer, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $13,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale. What do you think?
